message.error_command: Sorry! I couldn't execute this command üôÅ

covid.name: covid
covid.description: Gets COVID stats worldwide, or from a single country
covid.help_msg:
Available params:
`all` To get worldwide statistics
`countries` To get list of available countries
`[COUNTRY]` To get stats about a specific country. Example: `{prefix}covid united states`
covid.error_no_args:
You didn't provide any arguments, <@{author}>
You can send `{command_all}` to get worldwide stats, or `{command_countries}` to get a list of allowed countries.
covid.all_countries:
To use this command, send `{command} [COUNTRY]`, where `[COUNTRY]` can be one of: 

`{allowed_countries}`
covid.error_all_stats: Sorry! At this moment I can't process this query
covid.error_invalid_country:
**{country}** is not a valid country, <@{author}>

If you'd like to get a list of allowed countries, type `{command_countries}`
covid.loading: Please wait! I'm getting the info for you üôÇ
covid.error_no_info: Sorry! I couldn't get the information right now üôÅ
covid.error_no_country: Sorry! I couldn't find this country üôÅ

help.name: help
help.specific_help_msg: To see help about a specific command, send `{prefix}help COMMAND`, example: `{prefix}help covid`
